attributes.action: Insure that all legal tender coins that are minted go into general circulation.
attributes.additional_details:
If you look at apps that show every current legal tender UK coin you will see many that have never been released into general circulation - such as £5 coins - I never even knew they existed until the change checker app showed me. Furthermore many £2 and 50p coin designs never go into general circulation yet all can be bought (over face value) from subsidiaries of the Royal Mint like The Westminster Collection. IT'S WRONG!

https://www.changechecker.org/my-collection.aspx
attributes.background: I started collecting the various different design legal tender UK coins earlier this year (£2, 50p & 10p). I've since found many of the designs never ever enter general circulation so the only way to get them is buy them at many times there face value. This is wrong - all coins should be released!

rejection.details: This would be a commercial decision for Royal Mint Ltd.
